item.description:
Happy Gregorian New Year!! 

We're back for Wednedsay evening language exchange, this time at Mary Chung's restaurant in Central Square! 

6:00pm - 7:30pm Language Exchange in small groups

7:30pm - 9:30pm Dinner with full group together at large tables.

If you would like to stay for dinner please plan to bring $10-$15.  You are welcome to accompany us and not eat, choice is yours.

ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!!  This format is probably even better suited to beginners so please don't hesitate to join us!!
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the meetup group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
